contentList.content: You are <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with this Shield while using it.
Obsidian Armour

The wearer has a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> as long as they've had <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_FIRE_HEAT">Heat</LSTag> within the last turn.

The sword hums in anticipation, ready to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_MAG_Harpers_SingingSword_Sing">Sing</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_MAG_Harpers_SingingSword_Shriek">Shriek</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_MAG_Harpers_SingingSword_Shout">Shout</LSTag>, or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_MAG_Harpers_SingingSword_Screech">Screech</LSTag>.
Phalar Aluve: Screech

The sword Screeches. When you deal Thunder damage to a creature, it receives [1] turns of Singing Sword: Shriek.

The sword will stop screeching if unequipped.
Singing Sword: Screeching
When you deal Thunder damage to a creature, it receives [1] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_HARPERS_SINGING_SWORD_BANE">Phalar Aluve: Shriek</LSTag>.
Phalar Aluve: Shout

The sword Shouts. When you heal a creature, it receives [1] turns of Singing Sword: Song.

The sword will stop shouting if unequipped.
Singing Sword: Shouting
When you heal a creature, it receives [1] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_HARPERS_SINGING_SWORD_BLESS">Singing Sword: Song</LSTag>.
Can't wield anything in off hand.
Target must have something in off hand.
Take [1] to brand yourself with the mark of the Absolute.
Can't wield a weapon in off hand.
Must have a weapon in off hand.
Destructive Wave: Thunder
Emit a shockwave of pure thunder that damages nearby creatures and possibly knocks them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Under Where?
No seriously, where?
I Nap Periodically
You gain the full benefit of a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag> whenever you <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>.
Archer's Alacrity
Your faith of the heart is so strong that you can cast your special arrows once per combat without consuming them.
Shadow Blade Infusion
Use your magical blade to infuse another weapon, making it deal an extra [1].
Counts as a weapon dip / coating. Only lasts while the weapon remains in the possession of the caster.
Dealing an extra [1].
Flame Blade Infusion
If the target has no conditon that can be helped, they instead gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on their next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> this turn.
Has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on its next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
Cantrips that benefit from Extra Attack can only be used once per Action taken.
Candle Dip
Dip a weapon into the candle to light it on fire. If you are dual-wielding, you dip both weapons.
Call upon Bane's tyrannical aid, gaining [1] along with new strength and powers.

Bane has come to your aid! You have [1], advantage to Strength Saving Throws and Strength Ability checks, +[2] to weapon and unarmed damage, increased size. You can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MAG_CrushingFist_Gortash">The Closed Fist of Bane</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_MAG_ChainsOfTyranny_Gortash">Tyrant's Bindings</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MAG_UnarmedAttack_Bane_Gortash">Empowered Unarmed Strike</LSTag>.
Affected entity has only half its movement speed. When the chain breaks, it'll take [1] Force damage.

A nearby earth myrmidon grants the affected entity Resistance to Poison damage and an additional [1] to Elemental Retort.

The affected entity also gains temporary access to Cloudkill.

A nearby air myrmidon grants the affected entity Resistance to Lightning damage and an additional [1] to Elemental Retort.

The affected entity also gains temporary access to Lightning Bolt.

A nearby fire myrmidon grants the affected entity Resistance to Fire damage and an additional [1] to Elemental Retort.

The affected entity also gains temporary access to Fireball.

A nearby water myrmidon grants the affected entity Resistance to Cold damage and an additional [1] to Elemental Retort.

The affected entity also gains temporary access to Cone of Cold.

When attacked, the affected entity can draw on <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="MAG_RamazithsTower_ElementalSiphon">Siphoned</LSTag> magic to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MAG_RamazithsTower_Dummy">Elemental Retort</LSTag>.
Blast your foe with the elemental damage of each myrmidon currently <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="MAG_RamazithsTower_ElementalSiphon">Siphoned</LSTag>.
Can be used alongside Myrmidons summoned from other sources.
Caster Extra Attack
Gain the option to expend a large amount of <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slots</LSTag> in exchange for getting <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExtraAttack">Extra Attack</LSTag>.
Gained the <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExtraAttack">Extra Attack</LSTag> passive.
Caster Improved Extra Attack
Gain the option to expend all your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slots</LSTag> in exchange for getting <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExtraAttack_2">Improved Extra Attack</LSTag>.
Gained the <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExtraAttack_2">Improved Extra Attack</LSTag> passive.
Martial Weapon Arts

If you have the <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="MartialArts_BonusUnarmedStrike">Martial Arts</LSTag> passive, you are also <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with this weapon. It can also be used in place of <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_UnarmedStrike">Unarmed Strikes</LSTag> for your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_FlurryOfBlows">Flurry of Blows</LSTag> abilities.
